item.title: 迪士尼与 YouTube TV 就恢复频道达成协议
item.description: 迪斯尼公司与 YouTube TV 达成协议，将 ABC 和 ESPN 等频道恢复到在线视频服务中。【原文：Walt Disney Co. and YouTube TV reached an agreement to restore channels such as ABC and ESPN to the online video service.】

item.title: AFR援引麦肯锡报告称澳新银行未能面对坏消息
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，麦肯锡公司（McKinsey & Co.）批评了澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）的企业文化和领导层，称这家澳大利亚银行的员工不愿意挑战和传递坏消息。【原文：McKinsey & Co. has criticized the culture and leadership at ANZ Group Holdings Ltd., saying employees at the Australian bank are reluctant to challenge and deliver bad news, the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: 据说 Warburg 和 Permira 正在洽谈收购 Clearwater Analytics 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）和 Permira 正在洽谈收购投资和会计软件制造商 Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc.【原文：Warburg Pincus and Permira are in talks to acquire investment and accounting software maker Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国人工智能赌注转向电力和金属，科技泡沫担忧加剧
item.description: 中国投资者正在寻找下一个人工智能赢家，他们的目光从高歌猛进的芯片制造商转向构成该行业实体支柱的公用事业和金属生产商。【原文：Chinese investors hunting for the next artificial intelligence winners are looking beyond high-flying chipmakers to the utilities and metal producers that form the industry’s physical backbone.】

item.title: 债务谈判迫在眉睫，CD&R 支持的多彩公司销售额下滑
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，由于标签制造公司的债务负担日益加重，第三季度客户需求下降，Multi-Color 公司的盈利受到重创。【原文：Multi-Color Corp.’s earnings were hit hard by lower customer demand in the third quarter as the label making firm’s debt obligations grow more daunting, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 老虎环球减持 63% Meta 股份，Coatue 增持股份
item.description: 老虎环球管理公司（Tiger Global Management）在第三季度将其在 Meta Platforms 公司的持股削减了近 63%，将该公司在美国最大的多头押注降至第六大。【原文：Tiger Global Management slashed its stake in Meta Platforms Inc. by nearly 63% in the third quarter, reducing the firm’s biggest US long bet to its sixth-largest.】

item.title: 壳牌被判在液化天然气仲裁中支付风险投资公司全球法律费用
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）被勒令支付 Venture Global Inc.【原文：Shell Plc has been ordered to pay Venture Global Inc.’s legal fees for an arbitration case that the liquefied natural gas exporter prevailed in over the oil giant.】

item.title: 安克雷奇仅押注阿根廷诉讼就筹集到罕见基金
item.description: 安克雷奇资本顾问公司（Anchorage Capital Advisors LP）募集了一种罕见的基金，其收益取决于与阿根廷最大石油公司国有化有关的一场旷日持久、备受争议的诉讼的结果。【原文：Anchorage Capital Advisors LP has raised a rare type of fund whose returns hinge on the outcome of a protracted and controversial lawsuit tied to the nationalization of Argentina’s biggest oil company.】

item.title: AIG 称新任总裁约翰-尼尔将不再加入公司
item.description: 美国国际集团（American International Group Inc. 在周五提交的一份文件中称，该公司与即将上任的总裁约翰-尼尔（John Neal）达成了 "共同协议"，由于 "个人原因"，尼尔将不再加入该保险公司。【原文：American International Group Inc. said it reached a “mutual agreement” with incoming president John Neal that he will no longer join the insurer because of “personal circumstances,” it said in a filing on Friday.】

item.title: 惠誉上调希腊评级至 BBB，前景稳定
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将希腊的评级上调了一档，称尽管希腊计划放松财政政策，但预计该国的债务将继续下降，并将再次出现预算盈余。【原文：Fitch Ratings upgraded Greece’s rating status by a notch, saying the country is forecast to continue a debt decline and projected to have another budget surplus despite plans for fiscal easing.】

item.title: 他们投票支持特朗普。特朗普的关税摧毁了他们家族拥有的锯木厂
item.description:
今天的 "Big Take "播客：特朗普的贸易战如何导致北卡罗来纳州一家家庭经营的锯木厂倒闭？【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: How Trump’s trade war led to the closure of a family-run sawmill in North Carolina.

】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司斥资 49 亿美元入股 Alphabet
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. acquired 17.9 million shares of Google parent Alphabet Inc. during the third quarter, while further trimming its holdings in Bank of America Corp. and Apple Inc.】

item.title: 科技股崩盘，零售交易员倍感压力
item.description: 乍一看，华尔街本周几乎没有什么动静。【原文：At first glance, Wall Street barely moved this week.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克称 12 月利率决议 "拭目以待
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，虽然他能够支持最近的两次降息，但他还不相信下个月会有另一次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic signaled that while he was able to support the most recent two interest-rate cuts, he wasn’t yet convinced about another move next month.】

item.title: S&P 二十年来首次上调南非评级
item.description: S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）自 2005 年以来首次提升了南非的信用评级，理由是该国的经济增长和财政状况正在改善。【原文：S&P Global Ratings lifted South Africa’s credit rating for the first time since 2005, citing the nation’s improving growth and fiscal trajectory.】

item.title: 塞内加尔信用评级连续第三次被 S&P 下调
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）将塞内加尔的信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级，这是今年连续第三次将塞内加尔的信用评级下调，因为这个西非国家仍在与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）就新的融资计划进行谈判。【原文：S&P Global Ratings lowered Senegal’s credit rating further into junk territory, the third consecutive time this year, as the West African nation continues negotiations with the International Monetary Fund over a new funding program.】

item.title: 逆转关税蕴含的通胀风险
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 谷歌将投资 400 亿美元在得克萨斯州新建数据中心
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司计划投资 400 亿美元在德克萨斯州新建三个数据中心，在 OpenAI 和 Anthropic PBC 等竞争对手纷纷在该州下数十亿美元赌注的同时，谷歌的足迹也在不断扩大。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google plans to invest $40 billion in three new Texas data centers, ramping up its footprint as competitors such as OpenAI and Anthropic PBC map out their own multibillion-dollar bets in the state.】

item.title: Credicorp 称赞帕斯为吸引企业到玻利维亚投资所做的早期努力
item.description: 金融集团 Credicorp Ltd 乐观地认为，在罗德里戈-帕斯（Rodrigo Paz）总统就职后，玻利维亚结束了长达 20 年的社会主义统治，现在它可以发展玻利维亚的银行业务。【原文：Financial conglomerate Credicorp Ltd is optimistic that it can now grow its Bolivian banking business, following the inauguration of President Rodrigo Paz that ended two decades of socialist rule.】

item.title: 阿根廷电力生产商 Genneia 着眼于米莱时代的首次美国 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷电力生产商 Genneia SA 正准备在纽约进行首次公开募股，时间最早为 2026 年第一季度。【原文：Argentine power producer Genneia SA is preparing an initial public offering in New York for as soon as the first quarter of 2026, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: BLS 称美国 9 月份就业报告将于 11 月 20 日发布
item.description: 美国劳工统计局（Bureau of Labor Statistics）将于周四发布 9 月份就业报告，此前该报告因政府关门而推迟发布。【原文：The Bureau of Labor Statistics will release the September jobs report Thursday, after it was delayed due to the government shutdown.】

item.title: 纳斯达克 "增兵"，Cboe 缩减基金业务
item.description: 变革之风吹遍 ETF 上市领域【原文：The winds of change are blowing across the arena for ETF listings】

item.title: 美联储鹰派抓住焦点，提出反对 12 月减息的理由
item.description: 美联储政策制定者中的一个派别加大了对通胀进展可能放缓或停滞的警告力度，使人们对 12 月再次降息的前景产生怀疑，并暴露出央行内部日益加深的分歧。【原文：A faction of Federal Reserve policymakers has stepped up warnings that inflation progress could slow or stall, casting doubt over the prospects for another interest-rate cut in December and laying bare a deepening divide at the central bank.】

item.title: 美国延长对卢克石油公司的制裁豁免，新买家不断涌现
item.description: 特朗普政府延长了对卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）部分交易的制裁豁免，同时加强了与外国政府和潜在买家就俄罗斯石油公司国际资产问题的接触。【原文：The Trump administration extended a sanctions waiver for some Lukoil PJSC transactions as it steps up engagement with foreign governments and potential buyers over the Russian oil firm’s international assets.】

item.title: 苹果售价 230 美元的布质 iPhone 邮袋已售罄— 下面就是它的样子
item.description: 周五一大早，苹果公司纽约 SoHo 分店外就排起了长队，争先恐后地抢购限量版新产品：一个售价高达 230 美元的 iPhone 邮袋，苹果公司称其 "灵感来自一块布的概念"。【原文：Early Friday, a crowd of people lined up outside Apple Inc.’s SoHo location in New York to be among the first to get their hands on a new, limited-edition product: an up to $230 iPhone pouch the company said is “inspired by the concept of a piece of cloth.”】

item.title: 沃尔玛首席执行官让位于他曾引领新科技时代的同龄人
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc.首席执行官道格-麦克米伦（Doug McMillon）最近在谈到人工智能的影响时说，很明显，人工智能技术将改变 "每项工作"。【原文：Walmart Inc. Chief Executive Officer Doug McMillon recently spoke about the impact of artificial intelligence, saying it’s clear that the technology is going to change “literally every job.”】

item.title: 价格困扰选民，特朗普将削减牛肉和番茄关税
item.description: 据一位白宫官员透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于周五签署一项命令，降低牛肉、西红柿、咖啡和香蕉的关税，此举旨在降低食品杂货的成本，因为政府面临着选民要求降低日常用品价格的压力。【原文：President Donald Trump is slated to sign an order on Friday reducing tariffs on beef, tomatoes, coffee and bananas, according to a White House official, a move aimed at lowering costs on groceries as the administration faces pressure from voters to cut prices on everyday goods.】

item.title: NBA 审查森林狼队老板与卡尔希体育贸易公司的关系
item.description: 一家由 NBA 明尼苏达森林狼队和 WNBA 山猫队老板共同创办的公司已经开始在预测市场 Kalshi 上对体育比赛的结果进行交易，NBA 正在对这一安排进行审查。【原文：A company co-founded by the owners of the NBA’s Minnesota Timberwolves and the WNBA’s Lynx has started trading on the outcome of sports games on the prediction market Kalshi, an arrangement that is now being reviewed by the NBA.】

item.title: 荷兰公司驳斥中方指控，Nexperia 争端四起
item.description: Nexperia 拒绝接受其中国业务部门关于该公司通过阻止晶圆供应干扰生产的说法，因为即使在中国政府采取措施恢复重要汽车零部件的供应之后，这家荷兰公司内部的争斗仍在继续。【原文：Nexperia rejected a claim by its Chinese unit that it was interfering with production by blocking wafer supplies, as a feud within the Dutch company rages even after Beijing took steps to restore supplies of the vital automotive components.】

item.title: 贝莱德基金在 Binance 上发售标志着加密货币管道的转变
item.description: 贝莱德公司的代币化基金将被接受作为 Binance Holdings Ltd. 的抵押品，这一举措扩大了资产管理公司的区块链相关产品在最大加密货币交易平台上的使用范围，标志着华尔街与数字资产世界的联系不断加深。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s tokenized fund will be accepted as collateral on Binance Holdings Ltd., in a step that broadens access of the asset manager’s blockchain-linked products on the largest crypto trading platform and marks Wall Street’s deepening ties with the digital-asset world.】
